issue.title: Improve IME support with new `Event::Ime`

repository.name: egui
repository.description: egui: an easy-to-use immediate mode GUI in Rust that runs on both web and native

issue.body:
* Closes #4354 

Fix: can't repeat input chinese words

AND

For Windows :
ImeEnable
ImeDisable

body:
@rustbasic 
winit::event::Ime::Preedit(text, some(_)) this arm seems like unreachable, when i press the spacebar ,type into singline. there are some infomations: 
1.Ime Enabled
2. winit::event::Ime::Preedit(_, None)
3.Ime Commit
4.Ime Disabled

issue.title: Fix: A symptom of characters being copied when there are multiple TextEdits.

repository.name: egui
repository.description: egui: an easy-to-use immediate mode GUI in Rust that runs on both web and native

issue.body:
* Related #4358

Fix: A symptom of characters being copied when there are multiple TextEdits.

issue.title: Chinese can be entered in the first position of text_editor, but not in other positions

repository.name: egui
repository.description: egui: an easy-to-use immediate mode GUI in Rust that runs on both web and native

issue.body: **Describe the bug** Chinese can be entered in the first position of text_editor, but not in other positions **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. git clone eframe_template 2. setup custom fonts: fn setup_custom_fonts(ctx: &egui::Context) { // Start with the default fonts (we will be adding to them rather than replacing them). let mut fonts = egui::FontDefinitions::default(); // Install my own font (maybe supporting non-latin characters). // .ttf and .otf files supported. fonts.font_data.insert( "my_font".to_owned(), egui::FontData::from_static(include_bytes!( "msyh.ttc" )), ); // Put my font first (highest priority) for proportional text: fonts .families .entry(egui::FontFamily::Proportional) .or_default() .insert(0, "my_font".to_owned()); // Put my font as last fallback for monospace: fonts .families .entry(egui::FontFamily::Monospace) .or_default() .push("my_font".to_owned()); // Tell egui to use these fonts: ctx.set_fonts(fonts); } 4. cargo run **Expected behavior** check this scrennshorts can be entered in the first position but can not entered after "test" **Screenshots** **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: I check windows 11 and unbuntuhas the same behavior. - Browser - Version
